item.title: Denim Only
item.description:
Polo Ralph Lauren Denim Vest

The vest is from Polo’s Fall 2023 ready-to-wear look book. Well fitted vests accentuate the slimness of the waist and creates the appearance of broader shoulders. The dark wash of the denim offers a polished and semi-formal look. The wide fitting pants contrasts the fitted vest, creating a proportional small top-big bottom silhoutte.

Constructing the garment requires darts at the waist to reduce fabric in the area and tailor the fit.
